subject: British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: On the 17th hole, Phil Mickelson hit a shot that struck a young fan during a round of one-under-par 71 that left him eight shots behind the leader, Tiger Woods.
snippet: On the 17th hole, Phil Mickelson hit a shot that struck a young fan during a round of one-under-par 71 that left him eight shots behind the leader, Tiger Woods.
